This property specifies a file containing mappings between MIME content types and the corresponding file name extensions. The service itself contains a hardcoded set of most common mappings. The file must use the same syntax as the mime.types file of the Apache Server, i.e. [mimetype] [ext1] [ext2]...
For example /WEB-INF/conf/mime.types

This property specifies a file containing mappings between locales and the corresponding character encodings. The service itself contains a hardcoded set of most common mappings. The file should use the Java property file syntax, i.e. lang_country_variant=charset
For example /WEB-INF/conf/charset.properties
